replies.author: youyihj
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 友 于 2020-3-12 20:45 编辑 

安装Random Patches模组，其配置文件95-114行可以修改窗口图标及标题

    window {
        # The path to the 16x16 Minecraft window icon.
        # Leave this and the 32x32 icon blank to use the default icon.
        # Default: 
        S:icon16=

        # The path to the 32x32 Minecraft window icon.
        # Leave this and the 16x16 icon blank to use the default icon.
        # Default: 
        S:icon32=

        # The path to the 256x256 window icon which is used on Mac OS X.
        # Leave this, the 16x16 icon and the 32x32 icon blank to use the default icon.
        # Default: 
        S:icon256=

        # The Minecraft window title.
        # Default: Minecraft 1.12.2
        S:title=Minecraft 1.12.2
    }
复制代码

呀，才注意是原版问答……

replies.author: ShusXiaoy
replies.txt_content:
我也不知道：
1.试试右键你的Minecraft图标.
2.点击最下方的 属性 按钮.
3.出现的界面往下翻
4.可以看到一个  更改图标 按钮.
5.使劲点它.

replies.author: 晴天5
replies.txt_content: hmcl 请吧

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content: 我的hmcl任务栏图标在.minecraft\assets\virtual\legacy\icons可以找一下改掉，改成功了记得给个最佳
